Francis Catholic Secondary School (nke a na-akpọ SFCSS) bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nke ndị Katọlik, nke dị na Idimu, Lagos, Nigeria
Francis Cusimano guzobere ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na 1990 ma North-West Africa Province nke Society of Jesus na-achịkwa ya.

Francis mechara nke abụọ na nke atọ na mba na ule National Examination Council na 2014, ebe nwa akwụkwọ Oluwatobi Raji nwetakwara ezigbo nsonaazụ. Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ pụtakwara dị ka onye mmeri nke ihe ịma aka ụlọ akwụkwọ na kody na ụmụaka, 2015
Francis nọ n'ọnọdụ nke ịrị abụọ n'etiti ụlọ akwụkwọ otú narị kachasị elu na Naịjirịa n'afọ 2015. N'afọ 2016, ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ kwadoro asọmpi 18th Inter-House Sports (asọmpi okporo ụzọ na ubi).
